Name: China White (band)
rawData:
China White was an influential hardcore punk band from Huntington Beach, California, famous for their EP Danger Zone and their violent gigs. They were, along with the Crowd, Adolescents,
Social Distortion, T.S.O.L. and Shattered Faith, the most preeminent figures of the early Orange County punk scene.
Photographer Glen E. Friedman once described the band's sound as:
"Full doses of China White ... send staggering chills through your veins as you experience this nitro-punk injection."

Associated acts: Shattered Faith, Social Task, The Vandals, The Outsiders
